attributes.additional_details: The people have not been represented by a publicly elected Government for far too long. The mandate that was voted for has been corrupted and changed beyond recognition.
attributes.background: The repeated failier of the Conservative party to establish a competant Government clearly shows that a general Election is the only way forward.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
